## OWebNet.onBadNews() method

Called when `options.responseType` is `json` and `options.isGoodNews` returns `false`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onBadNews(handler: (this: this, response: ONetResponse<any>) => void): this;
```
